metadata.title: CVE-2017-0918 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Gitlab Community Edition version 10.3 is vulnerable to a path traversalissue in the GitLab CI runner component resulting in remote code execution.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
